sent.orig: It's time to celebrate your birthday. Happy birthday to an attractive and intellectual girl.
sent.trans: 是庆祝你生日的时候了，祝福美丽、聪颖的你生日快乐！

sent.orig: Panda birthday, blowing out birthday candles, the friends who asked it, what Hsu desire.
sent.trans: 大熊猫生日，吹灭生日蜡烛后，朋友们问它，许了什么愿望。

sent.orig: I'm baking Alex a birthday cake/baking a birthday cake for Alex.
sent.trans: 我正在给阿列克斯烤生日蛋糕。

sent.orig: Happy birthday, dear Norma. Happy birthday to you!
sent.trans: （唱）“祝你生日快乐，诺玛，生日快乐！”

sent.orig: May your life brighter as each birthday comes and goes. The nicest kind of birthday you.
sent.trans: 愿你每一个生日都使生命更加亮丽，祝生日无比夸姣、欢愉！
